name: Vupu
description:
Play as Vupu the space hamster and run away from the vortex devouring space-time behind you! Collect Time Crystals to keep your timer from reaching zero. Made for Ludum Dare 42 Jam.

>WASD - directions
>J - Roll-dash
>K - Jump

- Game by Lee Griggs and Calum Garlick(Twitter: @ivlimit)
- Music by Alex Ellis

Special Thanks to:
>BatteryJellyfish for his palette, Battery24
>Ryan Nielson, for his PixelCamera2D Unity package
>The Unity3D team
